duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with HR teams and managers to support the evolution of HR agenda including organization design, culture, talent management, learning, and performance management.
Lead the development of learning across Health & Wellbeing, leveraging resources available within Unilever and the acquired businesses.
Co-create and embed a unified Health & Wellbeing culture to enable the Global Business Unit organization model with cultural interventions to sustain high growth.
Manage all Health & Wellbeing data including required GBU reporting from across the companies, and ownership of data clarity within Workday.
Partnership with the finance team on monthly overheads management, reporting, and data quality.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS Required with 3+ year’s HR experience including business partnering experience with the appetite to develop strong business acumen
